deleteConfirmationDialog.title: Delete Chat?
deleteConfirmationDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this Chat? This action cannot be undone. Chat name:

auth.title: Welcome to SteerCode Chat
auth.description: Log in to your account to start chatting.

apiKeyInput.label: API Key
apiKeyInput.helperText: You can get your own API key from the OpenAI dashboard.

persistence.label: Save API key for future sessions?
persistence.helperText: If you select this option, your API key will be saved in your browser's local storage. Otherwise, you will have to enter it every time you open the app.

useLocalBackend.label: Use local backend
useLocalBackend.helperText: If you select this option, the app will use a local backend instead of the default one. This is useful if you want to run the app locally or if you want to use a custom backend.

customBackendUrlInput.label: Local backend URL
customBackendUrlInput.helperText: Enter the URL of your local backend. If you are running the app's backend locally, e.g. http://127.0.0.1:8081.

subscribe.description: Subscribe to SteerCode to get access to more features. And unlimited number of messages.
subscribe.subscriber: You are already a subscriber. Thank you for your support!

manageSubscription.description: Want to cancel your subscription? Click on the following link to
